name: resume-nextjs
description: Static HTML based RESUME made with next.js

scripts.dev:ko: copy payload\index_ko.ts payload\index.ts && cross-env DEBUG=eksume:* next
scripts.dev:en: copy payload\index_en.ts payload\index.ts && cross-env DEBUG=eksume:* next
scripts.prebuild:ko: cp payload/index.ts payload/index_backup.ts && cp payload/index_ko.ts payload/index.ts
scripts.prebuild:en: cp payload/index.ts payload/index_backup.ts && cp payload/index_en.ts payload/index.ts
scripts.build:ko: npm run prebuild:ko && cross-env NODE_ENV=production next build && next export --outdir docs/ko && mkdir -p docs/ko && touch docs/ko/.nojekyll && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:en: npm run prebuild:en && cross-env NODE_ENV=production next build && next export --outdir docs/en && mkdir -p docs/en && touch docs/en/.nojekyll && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cd payload && rm index.ts && mv index_backup.ts index.ts
scripts.deploy:ko: npm run build:ko && cd docs/ko && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy: ko' || echo No changes && git push
scripts.deploy:en: npm run build:en && cd docs/en && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy English resume' || echo No changes && git push
scripts.prebuild:ko:win: copy /Y payload\index.ts payload\index_backup.ts && copy /Y payload\index_ko.ts payload\index.ts
scripts.prebuild:en:win: copy /Y payload\index.ts payload\index_backup.ts && copy /Y payload\index_en.ts payload\index.ts
scripts.build:ko:win: npm run prebuild:ko:win && cross-env NODE_ENV=production next build && next export --outdir out && type NUL > out\.nojekyll && if not exist docs\ko mkdir docs\ko && xcopy out\ docs\ko /E /Y /I && rmdir /s /q out && npm run postbuild:win
scripts.build:en:win: npm run prebuild:en:win && cross-env NODE_ENV=production next build && next export --outdir out && type NUL > out\.nojekyll && if not exist docs\en mkdir docs\en && xcopy out\ docs\en /E /Y /I && rmdir /s /q out && npm run postbuild:win
scripts.postbuild:win: cd payload && if exist index.ts del index.ts && if exist index_backup.ts move /Y index_backup.ts index.ts
scripts.deploy:ko:win: npm run build:ko:win && cd docs\ko && git add . && git commit -m "deploy: ko" || echo No changes && git push
scripts.deploy:en:win: npm run build:en:win && cd docs\en && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy English resume' || echo No changes && git push
scripts.export:with-typedoc: npm run export && npm run typedoc
scripts.preexport: npm run clean && npm run build
